headline: IFF Announces Appointment of Brett Icahn and Richard Mulligan to Board of Directors
summary: NEW YORK, October 22, 2025--IFF (NYSE: IFF)—a global leader in flavors, fragrances, food ingredients, health and biosciences—today announced the appointment of Brett Icahn and Richard Mulligan, Ph.D., to its board of directors, effective Oct. 20.

headline: International Flavors & Fragrances: Why The Stock Could Be Poised For A Turnaround
summary: International Flavors & Fragrances is a smart buy after its 60% drop. Management expects modest 1-4% revenue growth in 2025. See more on IFF here.
